EmailTemplate.name: VC Case Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject} - {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting WEX Virtual Payments.
Your Account Manager will respond within 8 business hours. If you need immediate assistance, please call your Account Manager or our 24/7 Customer Service department at 877-557-6415.
Thanks for your message,
The WEX Virtual Account Management Team
